description: Command line interface for generating memory model diagrams with MemoryViz
filePathArgument: path to a file containing MemoryViz-compatible JSON
outputOption: writes generated SVG to specified path
roughjsConfigOption: options to configure how the SVG is drawn - refer to rough.js documentation for available options
globalStyleOption: path to a CSS file containing global styles for the SVG
themeOption: use themed styling for the generated SVG
noInteractiveOption: disable hover interactivity for object IDs

errors.outputMustBeFile: Error: Output path {{path}} must be a file.
errors.outputDirNotExist: Error: Output directory {{dir}} does not exist or is a file.
errors.cssFileNotExist: Error: CSS file {{path}} does not exist.
